mapper.select: SELECT lf.lf_img_main, lfb.lf_brand_name, lf.lf_name, lf.lf_st_coin FROM LLifeFurniture lf JOIN LFurnitureBrand lfb ON lf.lf_brand_id = lfb.lf_brand_id WHERE lf_sub_type = 0

SELECT LS.l_stream_name, LS.l_stream_time, TO_CHAR(LS.l_stream_time, 'MM/DD') AS stream_date, TO_CHAR(LS.l_stream_time, 'HH24:MI') AS stream_time, LFP.lf_package_name, LFP.lf_package_img, LFP.lf_package_st_coin FROM LSProduct LSP JOIN LiveStream LS ON LSP.l_stream_id = LS.l_stream_id JOIN LFPackage LFP ON LSP.lf_package_id = LFP.lf_package_id WHERE LFP.lf_package_type = 0

SELECT lf.lf_img_main, lfb.lf_brand_name, lf.lf_name, lf.lf_st_coin, lfc.lf_category_id FROM LLifeFurniture lf JOIN LFurnitureBrand lfb ON lf.lf_brand_id = lfb.lf_brand_id JOIN LFurnitureCategory lfc ON lf.lf_category_id = lfc.lf_category_id WHERE lfc.lf_category_id = #{fCategoryId} AND lf_sub_type = 0

SELECT lf.lf_img_main, lfb.lf_brand_name, lf.lf_name, lf.lf_st_coin FROM LLifeFurniture lf JOIN LFurnitureBrand lfb ON lf.lf_brand_id = lfb.lf_brand_id WHERE lf.lf_sub_type = 0 AND (lfb.lf_brand_name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR lf.lf_name LIKE '%{keyword}}%')
SELECT a.*, b.*, c.* FROM Furniture a JOIN FurnitureBrand b ON a.f_brand_id = b.f_brand_id JOIN LLifeFurniture c ON a.f_id = c.f_id WHERE b.f_brand_name = #{fBrandName}
SELECT a.*, b.*, c.* FROM Furniture a JOIN FurnitureMood b ON a.f_mood_id = b.f_mood_id JOIN LLifeFurniture c ON a.f_id = c.f_id WHERE b.f_mood_name = #{fMoodName}
